1 #include<segmentation_lccp/segmentation_lccp.h>
2 #include<gtest/gtest.h>
3 
4 /* Calling default Supervoxel parameters
5  *
6 */
7 
8 TEST(SuperVoxelParam, checkDefaultParams){
9  std::unique_ptr<supervoxel_parameters> param(new supervoxel_parameters);
10  EXPECT_TRUE(param->disable_transform);
11  EXPECT_FLOAT_EQ(0.0075, param->voxel_resolution);
12  EXPECT_FLOAT_EQ(0.03, param->seed_resolution);
13  EXPECT_FLOAT_EQ(0.0, param->color_importance);
14  EXPECT_FLOAT_EQ(1.0, param->spatial_importance);
15  EXPECT_FLOAT_EQ(4.0, param->normal_importance);
16  EXPECT_FLOAT_EQ(10.0, param->concavity_tolerance_threshold);
17  EXPECT_FLOAT_EQ(0.1, param->smoothness_threshold);
18  EXPECT_EQ(3, param->min_segment_size);
19  EXPECT_FALSE(param->use_extended_convexity);
20  EXPECT_TRUE(param->use_sanity_criterion);
21  EXPECT_FLOAT_EQ(0.02, param->zmin);
22  EXPECT_FLOAT_EQ(2.0, param->zmax);
23  EXPECT_EQ(400, param->th_points);
24 }
25 
26 /*
27  * LCCP segmentation tests
28 */
29 std::string pcd_file_;
30 
31 TEST(LccpAlgo, checkDefaultParams){
32  std::unique_ptr<lccp_segmentation> seg(new lccp_segmentation);
33  pcl::PointCloud<pcl::PointXYZRGBA>::Ptr cloud(new pcl::PointCloud<pcl::PointXYZRGBA>);
34  pcl::io::loadPCDFile<pcl::PointXYZRGBA> (pcd_file_, *cloud);
35  seg->init(*cloud);
36  EXPECT_TRUE(seg->get_disable_transform());
37  EXPECT_FLOAT_EQ(0.0075, seg->get_voxel_resolution());
38  EXPECT_FLOAT_EQ(0.03, seg->get_seed_resolution());
39  EXPECT_FLOAT_EQ(0.0, seg->get_color_importance());
40  EXPECT_FLOAT_EQ(1.0, seg->get_spatial_importance());
41  EXPECT_FLOAT_EQ(4.0, seg->get_normal_importance());
42  EXPECT_FLOAT_EQ(10.0, seg->get_concavity_tolerance_threshold());
43  EXPECT_FLOAT_EQ(0.1, seg->get_smoothness_threshold());
44  EXPECT_EQ(3, seg->get_min_segment_size());
45  EXPECT_FALSE(seg->get_use_extended_convexity());
46  EXPECT_TRUE(seg->get_use_sanity_criterion());
47  EXPECT_FLOAT_EQ(0.02, seg->get_zmin());
48  EXPECT_FLOAT_EQ(2.0, seg->get_zmax());
49  EXPECT_EQ(400, seg->get_th_points());
50  std::vector<Object> seg_objs;
51  seg->segment();
52  //table plane cloud size should be less than whole cloud
53  pcl::PointCloud<pcl::PointXYZRGBA>::Ptr table_cloud(new pcl::PointCloud<pcl::PointXYZRGBA>);
54  table_cloud = seg->get_plane_cloud();
55  EXPECT_TRUE(cloud->points.size() > table_cloud->points.size());
56  //There should be atleast 1 object
57  seg_objs = seg->get_segmented_objects();
58  EXPECT_TRUE(seg_objs.size()>=1);
59 }
60 
61 
62 int main(int argc, char **argv){
63  testing::InitGoogleTest(&argc, argv);
64  if(argc<2){
65  std::cerr<<"No test files were given. Please add the path of .pcd file to the test"<<std::endl;
66  return(-1);
67  }
68  pcd_file_ = argv[1];
69  return RUN_ALL_TESTS();
70 }

lccp_segmentation
Class to detect table top objects in a cluttered scene segmenting the point cloud. Algorithm is based on http://docs.pointclouds.org/trunk/classpcl_1_1_l_c_c_p_segmentation.html.
